Text: Re FavorAwesome I really appreciate it Id love to get em by early next week if possible thanks kent Dasovich Jeff wrote No problem Give me a little time and Ill get you some names Whats your timeframe Probably yesterday right Best Jeff Original Message From Kent Deverell mailto Sent Friday November PM To Subject Favor Hi Jeff Hope you are doing well Got your email from Scott Im hoping you can do me a favor We are doing a research project for a client and are trying to identify key technical management at a variety of companies including Enron Specifically we are looking for names and addresses of the following CIOCTO VP Directors andor Sr Managers responsible for the companys network Theyll typically have titles like VP of Network Operations and Senior Network Architect Any chance you can get me this info for Enron Id be forever in your debt thanks kent Kent Deverell Fluid w f wwwfluidcom This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Kent Deverell Fluid w f wwwfluidcom

Re FavorThanks for the help Ill take whatever I can get Are you going to be in Napa for Thanksgiving I think were coming up Saturday and watching some ball on Sunday Dasovich Jeff wrote Well I dont know if I can make good on the timeline but Ill see what I can do In any case I can get some names pretty soon Best Jeff Original Message From Kent Deverell mailto Sent Monday November PM To Dasovich
